scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:WikiMigrationName}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($wikisListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('wikisList')) #set ($nameQueryId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('nameQuery')) #set ($filterId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('filter')) #set ($migrationWrapperId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('migrationWrapper')) #set ($wikisWrapperId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('wikisWrapper')) #set ($getProgressWrapperId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('getProgressWrapper')) #set ($showProgressWrapperId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('showProgressWrapper')) #set ($noResultsWrapperId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('noresultsWrapper')) #set ($migrateSelectedId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('migrateSelected')) #set ($migrateAllId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('migrateAll')) #set ($deselectAllId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('deselectAll')) #set ($refreshId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('refresh')) #set ($wikiCountId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('wikiCount')) #set ($progressKey = 'wikis-massmigrate') #set ($status = $core_v2_widget.GetScheduledFileStatus($progressKey, "%{ RunAsServiceUser = 'true' }"))
#if ($status && ($status.State == 'Scheduled' || $status.State == 'Running'))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('MigrationInProgress')

$core_v2_ui.ScheduledFile($progressKey, "%{ IncludeProgress = 'true', IncludeAllMessages = 'false', IncludeLatestMessage = 'true', RunAsServiceUser = 'true' }") #end
#set ($options = "%{}") $options.Add('NameFilter', '') $options.Add('PageIndex', 0) $options.Add('PageSize', 20) #set ($wikis = $context.ListWikis($options))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('MigrationInstructions')

  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('MigrateSelected') $core_v2_language.GetResource('MigrateAll') $core_v2_language.GetResource('DeselectAll') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Refresh')

    $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('render-wikis.vm')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('NoMatchingWikis')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.pluginWikiMigrations') #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="DeselectAll">Deselect all</resource> <resource name="Migrate">Migrate</resource> <resource name="MigrateAll">Migrate all wikis</resource> <resource name="MigrateAllConfirm">Are you sure you would like to migrate all wikis?</resource> <resource name="MigrateConfirm">Are you sure you want to migrate the selected wiki(s)?</resource> <resource name="MigrateSelected">Migrate the selected wikis</resource> <resource name="MigrateSelectedConfirm">Are you sure you would like to migrate the selected wikis?</resource> <resource name="MigrationAlreadyRunning">The wiki '{0}' in '{1}' is already being migrated, please wait until the existing migration is complete or try again without selecting the wiki '{0}' in '{1}'.</resource> <resource name="MigrationInProgress">Wiki migration is currently in progress. The migration may take a considerable amount of time and may appear to hang at times. You do not need to remain on this page while the migration is running.</resource> <resource name="MigrationInstructions">Choose which wikis to migrate as articles. </resource> <resource name="NoMatchingWikis">No matching wikis were found.</resource> <resource name="NoWikis">No wikis</resource> <resource name="Refresh">Refresh</resource> <resource name="SearchFor">Search for...</resource> <resource name="SelectAll">Select all</resource> <resource name="WikiInGroup">in</resource> <resource name="WikiMigration">Migration</resource> <resource name="WikiMigrationDescription">Allows migrating one or more wikis to article collections</resource> <resource name="WikiMigrationName">Migrate Wikis</resource> <resource name="WikiMigrationSuccessful">The migration completed successfully</resource> <resource name="Wikis">Wikis</resource> <resource name="WikisPlural">{0} Wikis</resource> <resource name="WikisSingular">{0} Wiki</resource> </language>
